Reviews:
Eden Lau
Local Guide·21 reviews·7 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
I went at noon on a Monday — they took me in immediately and the service was so warm and friendly! As the shop name suggests, everyone here is hard of sight. The shop interior is dim/dark. The massage was FANTASTIC. Got myself a 45min foot and 45min shoulder massage for a cool $50. Definitely coming back here again.

Sharon Eng
Local Guide·14 reviews·16 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Really good place to get a massage! Especially after sitting at the desk all day. The prices are unbeatable, the therapists are skilful and the place is neat and tidy. The best thing is that you will be supporting dignified work for persons with visual disabilities. ❤️

Update: My shoulder ache disappeared the next day! So impressed I’m gonna go back every week!

Andy Lo
Local Guide·118 reviews·269 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Really enjoy my visits. I’ve been visiting this establishment regularly. The price is exceptional for the level of quality I get. The masseuse are visually impaired, but their heighten sense of touch allows them to know where exactly on your body requires more attention. Really excellent place to get a no to thrift massage.

3 reviews

I’ve been here a few times but realised i have not given them a review. Their massage are always on point, their staff are friendly and happy. Nurul Mimsy
Local Guide·72 reviews·300 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Honestly one of the best massage sessions that I’ve had. The place isn’t of spa standards but it’s the technique and friendly service that would make me return to this place. The prices are also very affordable for the services that are offered.

I’m really happy to see a place like this where our visually impaired friends can have an opportunity to find an honest living. I hope one day, you guys will be so successful that you can franchise and open multiple outlets across Singapore. Keep up the good work! ❤️

Leroy Koh
2 reviews·9 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Went for a 60 minute head shoulders and neck massage in the evening with my girlfriend. I made an appointment the previous day through SMS with the phone number listed on their Facebook page and glad I did because the place was packed; for a good reason

The services rendered are professional, no frills and to the point. Once we got started, I let the masseuse (Richard) know about pains/tightness I was experiencing and he began pressing away, all whilst asking if the massage was ok. Funny question by him because it was a great massage, felt A LOT of relief in my back and shoulders immediately after.

Will be returning here regularly and trying out the full body and foot massages!! I’m sure I won’t be disappointed :)

Lau Sherwin
4 reviews·1 photo
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Fuss-free but excellent- there probably isn't anywhere else providing comparable service at such prices and location. They don't use oils, so you can even pop by before an appointment in town. I suggest calling ahead if you're going on a weekend (I go almost every other week), and ask for Desmond (my go-to). Enjoy!

Teresa Lo
1 review
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Great service as usual and very friendly people. I don't usually post reviews but I just felt very bad when I heard about customers who made booking but did not turn up and did not pick up the phone when the masseur called to check if the customers are coming. As a result they lost income for that hour as they turned down a few walk-in enquiries as they reserved the slot for the customers who did not turn up in the end. Do call them to inform if there is any change to your plans and they will appreciate that. Richard was very patient to help with my sore neck and shoulder. Thank you!

Eveline How
Local Guide·16 reviews·6 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Great massage by blind masseurs who want to use their skills for their own livelihood. Wee Sin, Pin Pin, Swee Tin, Desmond, and their team are trained to do foot reflexology and body massage. I find myself alternating between foot massage, shoulder and back massage, and full body massage (fully clothed). Text for a time slot and Wee Sin will reply quickly. Appointments are highly recommended as they can get busy.

Ruth Lee
5 reviews·1 photo

I booked Pin Pin for 1h full body massage and 30min foot reflexology today. Both were amazing 😊 She expertly knows where to press with the right amount of pressure. Jason Lim
Local Guide·132 reviews·798 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Well I am a repeated customer here. Services are good I strongly recommend bernard for those who are having sore parts and can withstand strong force. Value for money but best part is able to support the disabled in the society and encourage them to work

S T
Local Guide·153 reviews·198 photos
Rated 5.0 out of 5,
Chance upon this place while having food at tanjong pagar food center. Not your atypical massage place. The staffs are visually impaired. Why they special then? It is their non discriminating way of serving customer. In a typical place. Most other operators will judge you via your physical build and deploy unusual heavy strength and thus sometime resulted in bruising.
This place however is different, 3 of my attempts were greeted with masseuse who consistently ask about the area of concern and will consistently kneeling out the stuff muscle. Result: painless smooth out muscle.

Expect long queue and turn away for walking customer. please do call 1 day in advance for arrangement.
Also good note to ask for their name for future return.
They are generally nice chatter. Make their day great and they will make your greater.
